title: EU slaps Chinese electric cars with tariffs of up to 38%
description: The European Union imposed provisional duties of up to 38 per cent on Chinese electric car imports due to alleged unfair state subsidies, sparking concerns of a trade war. The move was criticised by China as "politically motivated" and "protectionist." European countries are divided on the issue, with Germany fearing harm to its auto industry. Talks with China continue, with hopes for a negotiated solution to avoid escalating tensions.
